body: ah, this is oyster, normally I stay the hell away as his work is usually pretty bad/heart breaking but this wasn't his best story. Mainly because there wasn't one. maybe if we saw them getting the pictures or her receiving the gifts then it could have been something

TBH as terrible as it seems, with no actual plot or build up it doesn't have much of an impact. This kind of ntr is really easy to deal with as opposed to the "light" or "weak" NTR where we see an established love/couple and then the degeneration going on in the background. (the worst is when you get like 1-2 chapters of vanilla and then BAM! mind-breaking NTR out of nowhere chapter 3)
